languages.text: "Это война, {name}. Война за наше свободное будущее, и мы готовы умирать и убивать на ней, ибо наш враг бесчеловечен и глух к мольбам. Вы это заслужили". {n}Он решительно кладет руку на сердце.{/n}

"This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это война, {name}. Война за наше свободное будущее, и мы готовы умирать и убивать на ней, ибо наш враг бесчеловечен и глух к мольбам. Вы это заслужили". {n}Он решительно кладет руку на сердце.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

"This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

"This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

languages.text: "Das hier ist ein Krieg, {name}. Der Krieg für unsere Befreiung, und wir sind bereit, dafür zu sterben und zu töten, weil unser Feind brutal ist und taub für unsere Bitten. Ihr habt es verdient." {n}Entschlossen legt er seine Hand auf sein Herz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das hier ist ein Krieg, {name}. Der Krieg für unsere Befreiung, und wir sind bereit, dafür zu sterben und zu töten, weil unser Feind brutal ist und taub für unsere Bitten. Ihr habt es verdient." {n}Entschlossen legt er seine Hand auf sein Herz.{/n}

languages.text: «Estamos en guerra, {name}. Es una guerra por nuestra liberación, y estamos dispuestos a morir y matar por la causa, porque nuestro enemigo es brutal y hace oídos sordos a nuestras súplicas. Se lo tiene merecido». {n}Se lleva la mano al pecho con firmeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estamos en guerra, {name}. Es una guerra por nuestra liberación, y estamos dispuestos a morir y matar por la causa, porque nuestro enemigo es brutal y hace oídos sordos a nuestras súplicas. Se lo tiene merecido». {n}Se lleva la mano al pecho con firmeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「これは戦争だ、{name}。私たちの解放のための戦争であり、私たちは、そのために死ぬことも殺すことも厭わない。自業自得だよ」{n}男は固い決意を持って、心臓に手を当てる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これは戦争だ、{name}。私たちの解放のための戦争であり、私たちは、そのために死ぬことも殺すことも厭わない。自業自得だよ」{n}男は固い決意を持って、心臓に手を当てる。{/n}

languages.text: “这是场战争，{name}。这是为了解放而发起的战争，我们愿意为此牺牲，也愿意为此屠戮他人，因为我们的敌人残忍无情，对我们的祈求充耳不闻。这是你应得的下场。”{n}他坚定地将手放在心口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是场战争，{name}。这是为了解放而发起的战争，我们愿意为此牺牲，也愿意为此屠戮他人，因为我们的敌人残忍无情，对我们的祈求充耳不闻。这是你应得的下场。”{n}他坚定地将手放在心口。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous sommes en guerre, {name}. Une guerre d'indépendance pour laquelle nous sommes prêts à tuer et à mourir, car notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} est une brute tyrannique, sourde à nos revendications. Vous n'avez que ce que vous méritez. » {n}L'air déterminé, il pose une main sur son cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes en guerre, {name}. Une guerre d'indépendance pour laquelle nous sommes prêts à tuer et à mourir, car notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} est une brute tyrannique, sourde à nos revendications. Vous n'avez que ce que vous méritez. » {n}L'air déterminé, il pose une main sur son cœur.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu bir savaş {name}. Özgürlüğümüz adına verilen bir savaş ve bu uğurda ölmeye ve öldürmeye hazırız çünkü düşmanımızın acıması yok ve yakarışlarımıza kulağı tıkalı. Bunu hak ettiniz." {n}Kararlı bir edayla elini kalbine koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is a war, {name}. The war for our liberation, and we are willing to die and to kill for it, because our enemy is brutal and deaf to our pleas. You have deserved it." {n}He resolutely places his hand over his heart.{/n}
